Sentencas: Fuel cells have become one of the major areas of research in the academia and the industry with the numerous advantages they provide over the batteries and especially over the other small-scale sources of electricity including the photovoltaic and solar cells.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: Fuel cells generate electricity from hydrogen by a chemical process and are environmentally safe and efficient.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: Fuel cells have numerous stand-alone and grid-connected applications.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: The aim of the paper is to achieve the control of the fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: This is achieved by designing a suitable power conditioning unit.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: The power conditioning unit is needed for processing of the raw power output of the fuel cell in order to make it usable.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: The power conditioning unit might have only dc/dc converter or the two stages of dc/dc converter and dc/ac inverter.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: For the stand-alone part, the concentration is on the controlled direct current (dc) power, thus, only a boost converter (dc/dc) stage is used.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: For the grid interface of the fuel cell, controlled alternating current (ac) power is needed at the interface point of the fuel cell and the utility grid; thus, both stages, boost converter as well as the inverter (dc/ac), are needed.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: A power conditioning unit is designed for the solid oxide fuel cell, which can be used for other fuel cells with converter and the inverter of different ratings, but the control strategy will remain the same.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection

Sentencas: The fuzzy logic control strategy is used for designing the controllers for both the stages.
Titulo: Fuzzy logic control of fuel cell for stand-alone and grid connection
